verses.content: Chun, vânah inchikna dang ropuitak le maktak ka hmu a, vântirko pasari hremna pasari chawihai chu; chuong chu hremna nuhnung takhai an nih; chuonga chun Pathien lunginsenna chu a kim ta sih a.
Chun, hlimen mei le inpawl tuisuoriet ni âwmtak ka hmuh a; Sahrâng dâm, a lim dâm, a hming nambar dâm hnea hung suokhai chu Pathien ṭingṭang chawia, hlimen tuisuoriet panga ngîr ka hmu bawk a.
Chun, Pathien suok Mosie le Berâmte hla an sak a, “Aw Lalpa Pathien Iengkimthawthei, I thilthawhai chu a ropuiin a mak a; Nang, hnam tin Laltak, I lampuihai chu a felin ân dik a nih.
Aw Lalpa, tu am i hming inza nawh a, Chawimawi naw ding? Nang chau în thieng si; I thilthaw felhai chu suklang a ni ta leiin, Hnam tinrêngin chibai hung bûk an ti che,” tiin.
Chuong hnunga chun ka hang en a, chun, vâna inhriettirna biekbûk pindan sûngril chu ân hawng a;
chuongchun, pindan sûngrila inthawk chun hremna pasari chawi vântirko pasarihai chu, puon in- thieng vârtak silin, an âwm rang- kachak kâwngkhia inkhitin an hung suok a.
Chun, thilhring pali laia pakhat chun vântirko pasarihai kuoma chun, Pathien chatuona hring zing lungin- sennaa sip rângkachak berbu pasari a pêk a.
Chun, pindan sûngril chu Pathien ropuina le a thilthawtheina khuin a sip tah a; vântirko pasarihai hremna pasari chu a bo hmakhat pindan sûngrila chun tûkhawm an lût thei nawh.
